title: Just because of one bad game ...
body:
First of all, I never flame, I just try to cheer up my team a little when we are losing.

As Bard, I played 10 games 9 wins 1 loss, 4/6/20 kda or so.
Just because I played one bad game I get called by cancer botlane, and feed messages and all bullshits.
I try to say lets play or focus on playing instead of flaming and all of this, they just flame all day because I played bad this one game.

How to overcome these situations
